SELECT * FROM (SELECT IEI.ORDER_SN "orderSn", UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) "addTime", IEI.CONSIGNEE "userName", IEI.MOBILE "mobile", '换货' "type", IEI.EXCHANGE_SN "sn", IEI.CREATE_TIME "createTime", CASE IEI.SSTATUS WHEN 'cancle' THEN '已取消' WHEN 'cancleWaitDelivery' THEN '取消待发货' WHEN 'waitReceivePackage' THEN '待收包' WHEN 'receivePackageUnusual' THEN '换货收包异常' WHEN 'waitInitialCheck' THEN '待售后初检' WHEN 'waitGassAudit' THEN '待售后审核' WHEN 'shipped' THEN '已发货' WHEN 'signed' THEN '已签收' WHEN 'completed' THEN '已完成' WHEN 'waitCustomerAudit' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN 'waitDelivery' THEN '待发货' WHEN 'cancleToRepairs' THEN '转报修' WHEN 'cancleToReturn' THEN '转退货' WHEN 'cancleToOther' THEN '作废' ELSE IEI.SSTATUS END "status", IEI.CAUSE_INFO "causeInfo", TO_CHAR(IEL.REMARK) "remark" FROM IUNI_EXCHANGEGOODS_INFO IEI LEFT JOIN IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI ON IEI.ORDER_SN = IOI.ORDER_SN LEFT JOIN IUNI_EXCHANGEGOODS_LOG IEL ON IEI.EXCHANGE_SN = IEL.EXCHANGE_SN AND OPERATE = 'shAudit'
IEI.SSTATUS NOT IN ('cancle', 'cancleToOther') AND IEI.ORDER_TYPE = 'order'
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
UNION ALL SELECT IRI.ORDER_SN "orderSn", UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) "addTime", IRI.CONSIGNEE "userName", IRI.MOBILE "mobile", '维修' "type", IRI.REPAIRS_SN "sn", IRI.CREATE_TIME "createTime", CASE IRI.SSTATUS WHEN '0' THEN '已取消' WHEN '1' THEN '待收包' WHEN '4' THEN '报修收包异常' WHEN '3' THEN '待售后初检' WHEN '14' THEN '待客服审核' WHEN '5' THEN '待售后维修' WHEN '15' THEN '待付款' WHEN '2' THEN '待发货' WHEN '6' THEN '已发货' WHEN '8' THEN '已签收' WHEN '10' THEN '已完成' WHEN '16' THEN '转退货' WHEN '17' THEN '转换货' WHEN '18' THEN '作废' WHEN '19' THEN '取消待发货' ELSE IRI.SSTATUS END "status", IRI.CAUSE_INFO "causeInfo", TO_CHAR(IRL.REMARK) "remark" FROM IUNI_REPAIRSGOODS_INFO IRI LEFT JOIN IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI ON IRI.ORDER_SN = IOI.ORDER_SN LEFT JOIN IUNI_REPAIRSGOODS_LOG IRL ON IRI.REPAIRS_SN = IRL.REPAIRS_SN AND IRL.OPERATE = 'shAudit'
IRI.SSTATUS NOT IN ('0', '18') AND IRI.ORDER_TYPE = 'order'
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
UNION ALL SELECT IRI.ORDER_SN "orderSn", UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) "addTime", IOI.CONSIGNEE "userName", IOI.MOBILE "mobile", '退货' "type", IRI.DELIVERY_SN "sn", IRI.ADD_TIME "createTime", CASE IRI.STATUS WHEN 'application' THEN '申请中' WHEN 'audit' THEN '已审核待确认退款' WHEN 'cancelled' THEN '已取消' WHEN 'unusual' THEN '收包异常' WHEN 'receivedPacket' THEN '已收包待审核' WHEN 'completed' THEN '已退款' WHEN 'auditNoPass' THEN '审核不通过' ELSE IRI.STATUS END "status", IRI.CAUSE_INFO "causeInfo", TO_CHAR(IRL.REMARK) "remark" FROM IUNI_RETURNGOODS_INFO IRI LEFT JOIN IUNI_ORDER_INFO IOI ON IRI.ORDER_SN = IOI.ORDER_SN LEFT JOIN IUNI_RETURNGOODS_LOG IRL ON IRI.DELIVERY_SN = IRL.DELIVERY_SN AND IRL.OPERATE = 'shAudit'
IRI.STATUS NOT IN ('cancelled')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND UNIX_TO_ORACLE(IOI.ADD_TIME) < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
) TMP ORDER BY TMP."addTime" DESC, TMP."orderSn", TMP."createTime"
